item.title: About Smart Finance Guide
item.description: Our Mission Smart Finance Guide helps millions of Americans make smarter financial decisions. We provide free, expert-reviewed guides on insurance, personal finance, loans, and technology tools. Editorial Standards Every article on Smart Finance Guide follows strict editorial standards: Accuracy First. All financial data, rates, and statistics are verified against primary sources including official company rate pages, government databases, and industry reports. We update our content monthly to ensure accuracy. Expert Review.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Last updated: February 2026 Information We Collect Smart Finance Guide collects limited information to improve your experience: Automatically Collected: We use Google Analytics to collect anonymous usage data including pages visited, time spent, browser type, and device information. This data is aggregated and cannot identify individual users. Voluntarily Provided: If you subscribe to our newsletter, we collect your email address. We never sell or share email addresses with third parties.
